briefdescription.para: Field for index ID Usage: IndexMetadata::id == 1.
Field for table name Usage: IndexMetadata::table == "students".
Field for field name Usage: IndexMetadata::field == "name".
Field for field type Usage: IndexMetadata::type == "std::string".
Field for unique flag Usage: IndexMetadata::unique == true.
Field for index root page Usage: IndexMetadata::root_page > 0.
Field for creation timestamp Usage: IndexMetadata::created > some_timestamp.
Field for active status Usage: IndexMetadata::active == true.
Get primary key value for this metadata record.
Metadata for secondary indexes in the system catalog.

detaileddescription.para:
This structure stores information about secondary indexes created on tables. It's stored in the special _sys_indexes table and enables:
Persistence of index configuration across database restarts
Queryable index metadata using expression templates
Automatic index reconstruction when tables are loaded
